KnowledgeBase.Title: Example CpxVector compareLT 020
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareGT compareGE compareNE compareNE compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT functions to compare a Complex Vector with a Complex Number and another Complex Vector. A Boolean value is returned.

Syntax.Note:
The Complex Number is compared with a Complex Vector containing the
same value as the complex number.
The Complex Number has lesser value than the Complex Vector.
The first complex vector is defined.
The second complex vector is defined.

The imaginary part of the first Complex Number is greater than that of the second
complex Number.
Syntax.Hints: If you prefer an Integer resulting from the comparison , use the compare function.
